title: What is a computer?
subtitle: Computer is a things to calculate and do any other works
detail:
A computer is an electronic device that can calculate, process data, and perform many tasks.
It can be used for study, work, communication, and entertainment.

title: What is Flutter?
subtitle: Flutter is a tool to create a mobile application
detail:
Flutter is a UI framework developed by Google.
It is used to build mobile applications for Android and iOS using one codebase.

title: What is Dart?
subtitle: Dart is the language used in Flutter
detail:
Dart is a programming language created by Google.
It is mainly used with Flutter to develop fast and modern applications.
